# traitCollectionDidChange(_:)

**Instance Method**

Notifies the view when the device orientation changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency override dynamic func traitCollectionDidChange(_ previousTraitCollection: UITraitCollection?)
```

## Parameters

- **previousTraitCollection**: The prior state of the trait collection before the change occurs.

## Overview

This property inherits from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIView].

## Accessing view features

- **subviews**: An array that contains the view’s subviews.
- **layoutSubviews()**: Instructs the view’s subviews to position within the view.
- **encode(with:)**: Serializes the view to the specified coder.
